predicate.note: Frames file for 'exclude' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No access to verbnet. No comparison.

roleset.name: exclude, except

example.name: discourse function, with (empty) arg0
example.text: *trace* Excluding one-time additions to profit in each year, earnings per share were $2.47, up 7.4% from $2.30 in fiscal 1988.
example.arg: one-time additions to profit in each year

example.name: discourse function, no arg0
example.text: Still, the combined profit of Ford, Chrysler Corp. and General Motors Corp. fell 44% to $1.02 billion from $1.83 billion a year earlier, excluding a one-time gain of $309 million at Chrysler from the sale of Mitsubishi Motors Corp. stock.
example.arg: a one-time gain of $309 million at Chrysler from the sale of Mitsubishi Motors Corp. stock

example.name: real verbal, transitive
example.text: The figures exclude businesses now organized as American Express Information Services Co.
example.arg: businesses now organized as American Express Information Services Co

example.name: with excluded-from
example.text: The federal appeals court held that the nominal damages and the failure to prove all claims didn't exclude the USFL from being reimbursed.
example.arg: the nominal damages and the failure to prove all claims

roleset.note: The vast bulk of the examples are discourse-function. Treebank is very inconsistent with respect to including the Arg0 or not.
